description: First floor side extension, Single storey rear extension,  External alterations (Demolition of rear extension and ground floor rear bay window)
decision_conditions: <span style="font-size: 14px;">The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Aptos, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">Reasonable Exemption Statement, CN_100_EXISTING PLANS, CN_110_EXISTING PLANS, CN_200_PROPOSED PLANS, CN_210_PROPOSED ELEVATIONS, CN_002_EXISTING AND PROPOSED SITE PLAN, CN_001_LOCATION PLAN</span><table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="16" style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 11.8pt; margin-left: 5.35pt;"><tbody><tr style="height: 3pt;"><td width="16" valign="top" style="padding: 0cm 5.4pt; width: 11.8pt; height: 3pt;"><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table>

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
